quiz.subject: English
quiz.question: Choose the correctly punctuated sentence:
options: I can't believe it, he said
I can't believe it! he said.
I can't believe it,” he said.
I can't believe it.” he said.
quiz.answer: I can't believe it,” he said.

quiz.subject: English
quiz.question: Identify the passive voice sentence:
options: A letter was written by her.
quiz.answer: A letter was written by her.
